summary: The diff implements all core requirements for adding a third product with e-commerce functionality. The backend includes product data models, order management system, and query methods. The frontend implements checkout flow, order confirmation, and dynamic product listing from backend. However, the specific product image requirement (white/light blue wireless earbuds) cannot be verified from the diff as image files are not included.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the uploaded white/light blue wireless earbuds product image as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include the actual image file (wireless-earbuds-white-blue.dim_800x800.png) in frontend/public/assets/generated/. The backend references '/assets/products/bluex1_earbuds.png' but no evidence of this file being added or the generated image directory being populated.

hallucinated_features.description: Order status update functionality with updateOrderStatus and getOrderStatus methods
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend implements methods to update order status and query order status, which were not requested in any requirement. REQ-11 only requested storing orders and retrieving order history, not status updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Product availability filtering and unavailability checks during order placement
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend checks product.available during order placement and prevents orders for unavailable products. While the data model includes availability status (REQ-9), the BuildRequest constraints and requirements do not specify blocking orders based on availability.
